edu.up.cs301.tictactoe
Class TTTComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
  edu.up.cs301.game.GameComputerPlayer
      edu.up.cs301.tictactoe.TTTComputerPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
GamePlayer, Tickable, TTTPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
TTTComputerPlayer1, TTTComputerPlayer2
public abstract class TTTComputerPlayer
extends GameComputerPlayer
implements TTTPlayer

A computerized (automated) tic-tac-toe player. This is an abstract class, that may be subclassed to allow different strategies.

Version:
July 2013
Author:
Steven R. Vegdahl

Field Detail

piece

protected char piece
instance variable that tells which piece am I playing ('X' or 'O'). This is set once the player finds out which player they are, in the 'initAfterReady' method.
